alert.note: Alert for Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 9:45PM CDT until May 15 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Le Claire LD14. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.4 feet, Water affects 245th Avenue in Pleasant Valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday morning and continue falling to 9.1 feet next Friday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
